answer: <p>Being terminological, <code>[[</code> operator <strong>extracts</strong> the element from a list whereas <code>[</code> operator takes <strong>subset</strong> of a list.</p>
data.title: The difference between bracket [ ] and double bracket [[ ]] for accessing the elements of a list or dataframe
data.content:
<p>R provides two different methods for accessing the elements of a list or data.frame: <code>[]</code> and <code>[[]]</code>.</p>
<p>What is the difference between the two, and when should I use one over the other?</p>
